messages.title: THIS THURSDAY HELP MAKE HISTORY
messages.content: The Liberal Democrats need to win here to stop Labour taking over Southwark council.

mentions.tacticalSituation: It's so close here! The Liberal Democrats need to win here to stop Labour taking over Southwark council. There has been a huge surge for the Liberal Democrats across the country. Elections round here are always between the Liberal Democrats and Labour - Conservatives cannot win here.

housing.content: LABOUR WOULD END MONEY FOR ESTATES

quotes.text: Housing is essentially a private sector activity. I don't see the need for us to continue with such big renovation programmes.
quotes.source: Gordon Brown, BBC Paxman Interview, Friday, 30th April 2010

images.caption: Simon Hughes with supporters holding campaign signs.
Graph showing Liberal Democrats close to Labour.
